thread.title: Kane wins PL Player of the Month
thread.title_full: Kane wins PL Player of the Month

title: Kane wins PL Player of the Month

organizations.name: pl player of the month tottenham

text:
Tottenham striker Harry Kane wins Premier League Player of the Month award for February By Lyall Thomas   11:29am Harry Kane scored four goals in three Premier League games in February Tottenham striker Harry Kane has won the Premier League Player of the Month award for February. 
The 23-year-old scored four league goals in three appearances for Spurs as they won twice and lost once to solidify their place in the top four. 
Kane scored the winner in a 1-0 home win over Middlesbrough on February 4 before notching a hat-trick in 4-0 demolition of Stoke City at White Hart Lane on February 26. 
The England star has become the Premier League's current top scorer with 19 goals in 22 games. 
More follows...
